include_processing.description: Include files that are still being processed when the notification is sent

subscription_reminders.description: Receive reminders about upcoming subscription renewals and plan changes. Use Case: Help users stay aware of their subscription lifecycle to avoid service interruptions. Example: 'Your Professional plan will renew in 3 days for $49/month.'

trial_ending_alerts.description: Receive alerts when free trial period is ending. Use Case: Prompt users to choose a paid plan before losing access to the service. Example: 'Your free trial ends in 2 days. Choose a plan to continue using Knowledge Bot.'

storage_limit_warnings.description: Receive warnings when approaching or exceeding storage limits. Use Case: Alert users before uploads are blocked due to storage constraints. Example: 'You have used 1.8GB of your 2GB storage limit. Consider upgrading to avoid upload restrictions.'

usage_analytics_reports.description: Receive periodic reports about account usage, file uploads, and bot interactions. Use Case: Help users understand their usage patterns and optimize their workflow. Example: 'Your monthly usage report: 145 files uploaded, 2,340 AI interactions this month.'

security_notifications.description: Receive notifications about account security events like login attempts, password changes, and suspicious activity. Use Case: Keep users informed about account security to prevent unauthorized access. Example: 'New login detected from Chrome on Windows in New York, NY.'

feature_announcements.description: Receive announcements about new features, product updates, and platform improvements. Use Case: Keep users informed about new capabilities they can use. Example: 'New feature: Advanced AI chat with document context is now available for Professional users.'

marketing_communications.description: Receive marketing emails including promotional offers, company news, and industry insights. Use Case: Optional marketing communications for users who want to stay connected with company updates. Example: 'Special offer: Save 20% on your first year when you upgrade to Enterprise plan.'

weekly_digest.description: Receive weekly summary emails with account activity, recent uploads, and usage statistics. Use Case: Regular overview of account activity for users who prefer periodic updates. Example: 'Your weekly digest: 23 files processed, 5 new chat conversations, 89% storage remaining.'

system_maintenance_alerts.description: Receive notifications about scheduled maintenance, system updates, and service disruptions. Use Case: Keep users informed about planned downtime and system changes. Example: 'Scheduled maintenance on Sunday 2AM-4AM EST. Service may be temporarily unavailable.'
